name: LotteryBox
description:
How to play:
1. Click the red or white ball on the top, you can change the count of balls (max 9999).
2. Click the start button, a ball will be shown randomly.
3. If the red ball was shown, you win.
4. Click the stop button, all of the balls will be reloaded and the game is ready to begin.

Basic function:
- Let everyone have the same winning rate.
- Show the red and white balls' counts in the box.
- Show the total times on the left.
- Show the winner(red ball) times on the right.
- Click CL button to reset game.
